tool_description: Show latest news about Ukraine war
name: Ukraine war latest
title: Ukraine war latest

api_list.name: Get individual news source news
api_list.description: Get news about Ukraine war from an specific news resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ukraine-war-latest.p.rapidapi.com/news/usatoday"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukraine-war-latest.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ukraine-war-latest.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukraine-war-latest.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Ukraine war latest news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all latest news on Ukraine war from UK and US
